title: Red Bull Racing F1 Men's 2024 Team T-Shirt
description: Red Bull Racing F1 Men's Team Tee 2024 Navy This Men’s Short Sleeve Set Up T Shirt from the official Red Bull Racing collection is a chance for you to own a piece of racing history. Crafted from high-quality fabric with ergonomic mesh panels at the side, it provides breathability to stay cool throughout the most intense races. This T Shirt features the 20th-anniversary logo on the back to celebrate two decades of racing excellence. Regular fit, Subtle jacquard matte-knitted fabric, Crew neckline, Ergonomic mesh side panels, Screen-printed graphic at back, Branding at chest, arms, and back. Material: 88% polyester, 12% elastane
